person.persName: John T. Ralston (Resident of Kentucky in 1863)

body.p: Resident of Kentucky in 1863. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Burns Ralston. Father of W. H. Ralston, J. D. Ralston, Caroline Ralston, E. Ralston, and Andrew Ralston.

bibl.p: Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Sanders, p. 34; Kentucky, Birth Records, 1847-1911, Ancestry, Births, Gallatin County, Kentucky, Ohio River, 1853; KYR-0001-029-0554.
